Text: Warning everyone, this is not "Jack the Giant Slayer", notice this one's named "killer" instead of slayer. I cant believe all these producers trying to trick people nowadays in this way... imagine the poor people who actually pays for a movie like this and thinks hes paying for the good one hes seen on trailers =/

not heard of the other one but this sounds terrible. sadly i'll watch anything and everything by Asylum as they're usually terrible and i'm a masochist, so i'm really looking forward to this one. if only it stared Jake Busey it would have been perfect ;p

is it shitty that they make such atrocious movies to make a quick buck? sure. do people who pay money to buy/rent them right as they're hitting theaters deserve what they get? fuck yes they do! I might have a tiny shred of sympathy for people who waste $ renting them at redbox AFTER the real movies have also been released on dvd, but even then it doesn't take a genius to puzzle out that these are knock offs. a fool and his money...

I can't understand why anyone would want to download this in addition to, or in place of the original "good" movie.  The only reasons I can think of are ignorance or someone who just has way too much time on their hands. Oh, and also someone who enjoys being tortured by really shitty movies.
I cannot believe this piece of garbage movie actually made the top 100.... What a crock of shit! Who actually downloads torrents without reading the specifics?
OMG - that had to have been one of the WORST movies I have ever seen!  I can't believe Ben Cross associated himself with that turd.
